entry.title: Algorave
entry.summary: vou, hmurd, P38, peterMann, Digital Selves, Allo Alik, 0001, Innocent, Renick Bell, Type, hortense, Eric Nystrom, Winston, Algobbz, Coral Manton, Emily Donovan, Hellocatfood, Sian Morell... and more TBC.

entry.title: QMUL Talks
entry.summary: Three lightning talks given by QMUL's Live Code team.
entry.content: Three lightning talks given by QMUL's Live Code team.

entry.title: Keynote Talk - Renick Bell
entry.summary: Renick Bell is a computer musician, programmer and teacher. His current research interests are live coding, improvisation, and algorithmic composition using open source software.
entry.content: Renick Bell is a computer musician, programmer and teacher. His current research interests are live coding, improvisation, and algorithmic composition using open source software.

entry.title: Workshop - SuperCollider
entry.summary: Learn to live code music using SuperCollider. This is a more advanced workshop and some understanding of live coding is expected.
entry.content: Learn to live code music using SuperCollider. This is a more advanced workshop and some understanding of live coding is expected.

entry.title: Workshop - Visual Coding in Pure Data
entry.summary: Learn to Live Code Visuals using Pure Data. This worksop is suitable for beginners, however some experience of data flow languages is advised.
entry.content: Learn to Live Code Visuals using Pure Data. This worksop is suitable for beginners, however some experience of data flow languages is advised.

entry.title: Workshop - Tidal Cycles
entry.summary: Learn to live code music using Tidal Cycles. This worksop is suitable for beginners, however some coding experience is advised.
entry.content: Learn to live code music using Tidal Cycles. This worksop is suitable for beginners, however some coding experience is advised.
